channel.title: Artwork
channel.description:
I wish there would exist a BM Fan Store, but I know there will never be one, because for different reasons.
But it would at least being cool, if you could create at least the media in virtual form, so that everyone could print it out by himself. I could imagine for example a few cool posters or overprints for T-Shirts and mugs.
Would be great to have a category on the media page, where you also could add links to different Internet print services.
What do you think?

item.title: Artwork
item.dc:creator: Stickyman
item.description:
Like this one? They do an official Aperture Science one too.

13 bucks!? Geez that’s ridiculous.

item.dc:creator: Marv

Otto:

The Valve store already has bunch of T-shirts and Black Mesa mugs though.

But not with the Black Mesa (Source) writing/logo.
It should at least plug the mod in any way.
